title: Commerce System Template
description: Defines the monetary and trade system of a sovereign power including currency, denominations, pricing references, trade goods, and merchant guilds. Use Earth pricing as a baseline, swap terms, and adjust consistently.

currency_type.description: Type of currency system -- units of weight transcend borders; units of value depend on government stability

unit_basis.description: Whether currency is a unit of weight (gold valued by weight, transcends borders) or unit of value (denomination stamped, depends on government stability) or hybrid

conversion_rates.description: Conversion between denominations and to foreign currencies

government_backed.description: Whether currency is government-backed -- collapse of government destroys value of units of value but not units of weight

counterfeiting_controls.description: Anti-counterfeiting measures -- milling on coin edges (shaving detection), touchstones for metal purity, watermarks on bills

price_reference.description: Reference prices for common items (use Earth values as starting point)

trade_goods.description: Major trade goods produced and traded

x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: This system belongs to a sovereign power
x-cross-references.products-to-source-mapping: Trade goods are sourced from plants and animals
